articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: According to a memo published by the SEC, officials from the Division of Trading and Markets met with Grayscale's CEO and other principals.
articles.title: Grayscale Met With SEC to Discuss Spot Bitcoin ETF Bid

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Following a week of turmoil at OpenAI that saw Sam Altman leave the ChatGPT developer, Altman will return as CEO of the firm.
articles.title: Sam Altman Reinstated as OpenAI CEO

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Apple's Tim Cook spoke with Dua Lipa about AI's potential and the necessity for regulatory frameworks.
articles.title: AI Needs ‘Rules of the Road’: Apple CEO Tim Cook

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Kyle Vogt said he was optimistic about his business, but regulatory actions may have made moving forward untenable.
articles.title: Cruise CEO Steps Down Amid Self-Driving Car Safety Crisis

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: While the drama at OpenAI captures most of the attention, OpenAI challenger Anthropic delivers the latest version of its capable chatbot.
articles.title: Anthropic Upgrades Claude With Nearly Twice The Capabilities of GPT-4 Turbo

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Animoca Brands and Ubisoft are teaming up to add Champions Tactics to the Mocaverse Frequent Player Program.
articles.title: Ubisoft's 'Champions Tactics' NFT Game Is Coming to Animoca's 'Mocaverse'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The expanded version of Cyberpunk 2077 is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox—but only one version ships with three discs.
articles.title: Why 'Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition' Needs 3 Discs on Xbox

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The exit of its CEO suggests a resurgence in U.S. regulatory pressure, but how relevant is the development to borderless cryptocurrencies?
articles.title: Is Bitcoin Better Off Without CZ Helming Binance?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Market experts weigh in on how the embattled exchange moves forward—will Binance’s status fall without CZ at the helm?
articles.title: What Will a Post-CZ Binance Look Like?

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Industry response to CZ’s guilty plea and Binance’s shakeup has been mixed, with some arguing that the news is actually good for crypto.
articles.title: 'Crypto Isn't Going Anywhere': Industry Leaders Weigh In on Binance Crackdown

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: What are the odds the fallen Binance CEO will join Sam Bankman-Fried on the prison yard? Here's a look at what Changpeng "CZ" Zhao is facing.
articles.title: Will Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Go to Prison?

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description:
Welcome to the first IRL episode of This Time Will Be Different!

In this week's episode, our host, Reza Jafery, is joined by Allie Eve Knox, the Spankchain Chief of Staff and FinDomme. 

They discuss
- How to sell feet pics
- If crypto is really as permissionless as it seems
- the intersections between crypto and sex work
articles.title: Allie Eve Knox on Spankchain and the life of a Crypto Financial Dominatrix

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The $4.3 billion settlement is one of the largest corporate penalties in U.S. history, says DOJ.
articles.title: Binance Must 'Completely Exit' From US as It Settles Years-Long Criminal Investigation

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Binance founder Changpeng Zhao has resigned as CEO, and confirmed that Richard Teng will take over the role.
articles.title: Binance's CZ: 'I Made Mistakes', Confirms Richard Teng Will Take Over as CEO

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: One JPEG flipper saw millions of dollars in rewards from Blur's Season 2 airdrop. Now the marketplace is teasing its own Ethereum layer-2 network, Blast.
articles.title: Someone Got $8.4 Million in Blur NFT Marketplace's Latest Airdrop

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: A freshly launched token called "CZ" is already trading on Ethereum DeFi exchange Uniswap—and up 18,000%.
articles.title: Degens Have Already Found a Way to Make Money on CZ Stepping Down

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Binance and CEO Changpeng Zhao will reportedly plead guilty today amid a settlement with the U.S. DOJ. BNB quickly tumbled on the news.
articles.title: BNB Plunges as Crypto Market Reacts to Binance CEO Stunner

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: CZ is out, but Binance survives as part of a DOJ settlement.
articles.title: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao to Step Down, Plead Guilty to Money Laundering

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: A Binance settlement bullish for Bitcoin? The market seems to think so.
articles.title: Bitcoin Bounces as DOJ Preps to Make Binance Settlement Official

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The current Fortnite OG season will end in early December, and Epic Games is teasing massive new developments for the free-to-play shooter.
articles.title: Fortnite's Big Bang Event Marks 'New Beginning' for Epic’s Smash Game

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Powell accused the SEC of extortion after the regulator leveled new charges at the crypto exchange, including commingling customer funds.
articles.title: Kraken Co-Founder Jesse Powell: SEC 'USA's Top Decel'

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: With 90% of OpenAI staff threatening to follow ousted CEO Sam Altman to Microsoft, investors are reportedly exploring legal options.
articles.title: OpenAI In 'Intense Discussions' to Prevent Staff Exodus: Report

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Evinova aims to use AI to design studies, automate cost calculations, and determine feasibility for drug testing.
articles.title: Drug Giant AstraZeneca Launches Evinova to Quicken Clinical Trials

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Ads are reportedly being placed next to antisemitic posts on Twitter, and some of the biggest entertainment and tech firms—like Ubisoft—want out.
articles.title: Ubisoft Halts Twitter Ads, Joining IBM, Apple, Disney, Warner Bros.

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Granted, BONK promptly fell 29% after hitting that peak, but the Solana meme coin has still doubled in price over the past week.
articles.title: BONK Goes Boom: Solana Meme Coin Soars 1,700% in 30 Days to Hit All-Time High

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: As the Altman and OpenAI drama unfolds, Worldcoin remains quiet.
articles.title: WLD Had a Wild Weekend—What's Next for Sam Altman's Worldcoin?

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Upstart crypto exchange Backpack also airdropped the Solana-based PYTH token to tens of thousands of new users as a reward.
articles.title: Pyth Airdrop Puts $77 Million in the Wallets of Crypto Users

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: As calls to slow development of artificial intelligence to ensure safety grow louder, Meta is broadening its efforts.
articles.title: As ‘Decels’ Rise, Meta Dissolves Its Responsible AI Team

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The United States regulator has filed fresh charges against Kraken, just nine months after settling previous charges.
articles.title: SEC Files Charges Against Crypto Exchange Kraken—Again

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Another crypto business has bit the dust. Bittrex Global is winding down operations following the closure of its U.S. exchange in March.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Bittrex Global Shuts Down Following Battle With SEC

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Bitcoin maximalists and crypto industry leaders are celebrating the rise of Javier Milei, in the hopes the controversial politician will benefit crypto.
articles.title: Argentina's Next President Says It's OK to Sell Babies—Here's Why Bitcoin Lovers Love Him

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: Will crypto be the currency of choice for the AI of the future? Crypto investors are betting on it.
articles.title: Will AI Use Crypto? Here’s What’s Driving AI Token FOMO

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin is hovering near $38,000 and Ethereum has been able to stay above $2,000 as the global crypto market cap nears $1.5 trillion.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Hover Near Yearly Highs as ETF Hopes Stay Alive

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Emmett Shear has a long history in tech, primarily focused on livestreaming platform Twitch. But what is Shear's approach to AI development?
articles.title: Who Is Emmett Shear? New OpenAI CEO Is an AI 'Doomer' Who Thinks It Might Kill Us All

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: You don't need to own an expensive NFT to buy the latest Nike x RTFKT sneakers—and they actually come with NFTs.
articles.title: 'Oops, You Stepped Into the Future': Nike Drops Sneakers With NFTs

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: The DOJ's negotiations include possible criminal charges against Binance's founder and CEO Changpeng Zhao, but would allow Binance to keep operating.
articles.title: DOJ Is Seeking $4 Billion From Binance, Criminal Charges Against CZ

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: A tumultuous weekend for the AI giant saw its co-founders depart for Microsoft amid a boardroom battle. Here’s how it happened.
articles.title: How Sam Altman Was Pushed From OpenAI Into Microsoft's Open Arms

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The investigation was conducted with blockchain analysis firm Chainalysis. The $225 million is the largest-ever freeze of USDT, Tether said.
articles.title: Tether Freezes $225M USDT Feds Say Is Linked to Human Trafficking

articles.description:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.

Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Jeff Davis

articles.description: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.
articles.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home

articles.description: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.
articles.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash

articles.description:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action. 


Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?
articles.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]

articles.description: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.
articles.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'

articles.description: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.
articles.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson

articles.description: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.
articles.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create

articles.description: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.
articles.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick

articles.description: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.
articles.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System

articles.description: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.
articles.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games

articles.description:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.

Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid

articles.description:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol. 

They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.
articles.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega

articles.description: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.
articles.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?

articles.description: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!
articles.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion

articles.description:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.

Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.
articles.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.
articles.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans

articles.description: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.
articles.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director

articles.description: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.
articles.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token

articles.description:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.

Follow Decrypt's GG on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ggdecrypt

articles.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
